titles: The kitchin-maids answer to the London apprentice's Word to the wavering Levite, &c. being a vindication of the Reverend Dr. Sherlock ... for his taking the oaths.
author: Kitchin-maid.

keywords: London apprentice of the Church of England. --  Word to a wavering Levite.
